Key Match Events: The Cardinals got off to a fast start in Saturday's game
Giancarlo Stanton laced a three-run double in the bottom of the 8th inning
Ryan Helsley struck out Austin Wells to give St. Louis their first win in the Bronx in 60 years
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals, for the first time in franchise history, defeated the Bronx Bombers at the New Yankee Stadium
Others: The Yankees currently maintain a one-game lead over the Baltimore Orioles in the American League East
